ya9.3:1.1: » Yo kusalaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveti so akusalaṃ dhammaṃ pajahatīti? Āmantā.
ya9.3:2.1: « Yo vā pana akusalaṃ dhammaṃ pajahati so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetīti? Āmantā.
ya9.3:3.1: » Yo kusalaṃ dhammaṃ na bhāveti so akusalaṃ dhammaṃ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
ya9.3:4.1: « Yo vā pana akusalaṃ dhammaṃ nappajahati so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ na bhāvetīti? Āmantā …pe….
